title: Setting
description: Customize your experience by adjusting the theme and language settings.

token_price.intro_desc_preset: Preset model prices can be adjusted, but using the official pricing is recommended.
token_price.preset_note: Note: {model} pricing is preset based on official rates. You may adjust as needed, but official pricing is recommended for accuracy.
token_price.custom_note: Tip: Please set the token prices based on your custom model's actual pricing for an accurate cost estimate.
